channel.title: My first work in Sony Vegas Pro
channel.description:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3AG_vGvzVm8[/youtube]
I created this today, it is my first work on Sony Vegas pro, accepting feedback and would be much appreciated if you dropped a like. UPDATE-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I have spent time and I have truly made it MLG Pro. [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pgq04CnFpSw[/youtube]
